featured.text: The barking of the hound, which drives deer to panic, strengthens the effect of the warning noise, according to the RTRI.

definition.zh_def: 狗吠聲；發出類似狗叫的聲音。
definition.en_def: The sound made by a dog; to make a similar sound.
definition.example: The dog was barking loudly at the mailman.
